metadata.name: The adoption of Bitcoin. (NFT)
metadata.description:
The adoption of Bitcoin. (NFT)
Mp4
Dimensions: 2322 × 2826
Year: 2022

Artwork created from the piece entitled: The Adoption of Bitcoin / The new era of money. Made in oil on linen, with measurements of 70x56.5 cm. in the year 2021

This artwork pays tribute to the growing world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies.
The graph in the background shows the bitcoin price fluctuations starting from the time I entered the crypto world and the time I finished this piece.
